Amped Code

05 November 2018

Amped Code

Amped Code is a group of developers, designers and programmers. This design is a design I made for them. At the very least for my portfolio.

This was an example of what the blog section would look like. It was powered by Jekyll.

This is just a screenshot of what an actual blog post would look like. The design is inspired by the way Medium does some blog posts design.
